H0.text: Which Greek mythological creature has the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle. Griffin

H1.text: Which Greek mythological creature has the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle. Chimera

H2.text: Which Greek mythological creature has the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle. Sphinx

H3.text: Which Greek mythological creature has the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle. Axex

A4.text: The griffin, griffon, or gryphon (Ancient Greek: γρύψ, romanized: grýps; Classical Latin: gryps or grypus; Late and Medieval Latin: gryphes, grypho etc.; Old French: griffon) is a legendary creature with the body, tail, and back legs of a lion, and the head and wings of an eagle with its talons on the front legs.
